welcomeDescription: 50 hectares, 20 of which are forest. One hour to Helsinki. Own lake. Mountain slope. Restaurant being built from an old barn. One usable and one renovated sauna by the lake. Campsite's shared showers, toilets and sauna. A few lean-tos. A residential building to be renovated. An old ski slope and a couple of lifts, one might work. Fully ready for summer camps with many possibilities.
auctionInfo: Estimated value 200-300kâ‚¬, over half of which is forest. Looking for doers and partners, as well as shareholders with 10-50kâ‚¬ shares.
autoSaveDescription: You can fill in multiple sessions - answers are automatically saved to your browser
clearFormConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all form data? This will return you to the welcome screen.
formCleared: Form has been cleared! You'll see the welcome screen again.
